entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:49PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels On The Tanana River Into the Weekend... The Tanana River between Delta Junction and Fairbanks will be rising to near bankfull levels this week. Most gravel bars will be covered with water and some low lying access points to the river could be inundated with water. Runoff from recent heavy rain in the Alaska Range near Delta
entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley

The Virginia Department of Environmental Quality has issued a Code Orange Air Quality Alert across the Hampton Roads Area for Fine Particulates. The Air Quality Alert is in effect until midnight EDT tonight. Air quality is expected to reach Code Orange, which is unhealthy for
